dl.dd: Type: one of the values below
Can be used to create checkable menuitems or for radio button menuitems.

ul.li: checkbox: The template.XULElem("menuitem") is checked. The template.XULAttr("checked") attribute determines whether the menuitem is checked or not.

radio: The template.XULElem("menuitem") becomes part of a radio group. Other menuitems that have the same value for their template.XULAttr("name") attributes are part of the same template.XULElem("radio") group. Only one menuitem in the same radio group can be checked at once.

body.p: More information on adding checkmarks to menus in the XUL tutorial
